segments.text: I feel a growing sense of dread watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy is on looks absolutely treacherous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, it's tilting, it's going to go over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water, it's just flowing relentlessly from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, making the floor incredibly slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip and fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the chaos when the woman finally notices everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There could be broken dishes, a bumped head, and a flooded kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes my stomach clench just thinking about the potential mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these obvious hazards?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside seems to mock the impending disaster indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a ticking time bomb of domestic accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
